task.title: Create Printable Report
task.shortdesc: Create a detailed printable report of querys results.

taskbody.context: From the Query Project window with a Query Tab open:

step.cmd: Click the Report button at the top of the numbered Query tab.
Choose Create printable report and click Next.
step.stepresult: The Report Wizard will prompt you to specify options for your printable report.

step.cmd: Enter a Report name and Save location and specify Output formats and Pagination and Report Preview details in Report Wizard. Click the Next button to continue.
step.stepresult: The Report Wizard then prompts you to select Report Format options.

step.cmd: Use the + and - buttons to select the report structure from the hierarchy on the left. Clicking on each element in the report structure will allow you to specify options for each report section. When you have finished specifying report structure and section options, click Next.
step.stepresult: Your report will now be available in the Save location specified in Step 3. When the Report worker shutdown message appears and you have finished reviewing your Report Preview if you chose to generate one, click Close in the Report Wizard window.
